name: Eye of the Gods
damage_resistances: fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) radiant (good or neutral eyes) or necrotic (evil eyes) damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.desc: The eye of the gods inspires all allies within 10 feet. For 1 minute, all inspired creatures have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
actions.name: Divine Inspiration (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.desc: A hostile creature that touches the eye of the gods or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) radiant (good or neutral eyes) or necrotic (evil eyes) damage.
special_abilities.name: Blazing Nimbus

special_abilities.desc: Allies within 10 feet of the eye of the gods have truesight of 20 feet.
special_abilities.name: Corona of Truth

special_abilities.desc: The deity that created the eye of the gods can see everything the eye sees and can instantly recall the eye to its side at any time.
special_abilities.name: Divine Conduit

special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the eye of the gods can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.
special_abilities.name: Ethereal Jaunt
